title: Baker's Selection Afternoon Cream Tea
description: Our wonderfully whipped cream delights - pick your perfect treat! Belgian chocolate profiteroles Jam and cream scones Jam and cream donuts

title: Baker's Selection 9 Mini Toffee Cupcakes
description: Toffee sponge with toffee sauce filling, topped with toffee frosting and edible decorations

title: Baker's Selection Strawberry Cream Scones
description: 2 Fruited scones with strawberry compote and stabilised whipped cream

title: Extra Special Strawberry Conserve
description: Strawberry extra jam made using whole fruit

title: Extra Special Triple Layer Belgian Chocolate and Salted Caramel Cake
description: Dark chocolate sponge filled and topped with a layer of salted toffee and Belgian dark chocolate buttercream and decorated with toffee fudge pieces

title: Mr Kipling Cherry Bakewells
description: Light pastry cases filled with a layer of fruity plum and raspberry jam, moist almond sponge and soft icing. The legendary classic finished with half a cherry on the top.

title: Extra Special Hand Finished Carrot Cake
description: Carrot cake with sultanas, mixed spice, cassia, nutmeg, cream cheese frosting and nibbed walnuts

title: Extra Special Hand Finished Blueberry Cake
description: Blueberry sponge topped with cream cheese frosting and blueberry jam

title: Extra Special Triple Layer Vanilla Latte Cake
description: Coffee sponge layers filled and topped with coffee flavoured buttercream and vanilla bean flavoured buttercream, decorated with chocolate coffee beans and chocolate

title: 12 Indulgent Cupcakes
description: Our marvellous medley of sponges, oozing with gooey centres and delightfully decorated with sweet treats
